channel.title: How to Add an object? help plz
channel.description: hello, i have my own running server but i wanted to add a bank booth and npc portals to my home area how and were would i got to do that?

item.title: How to Add an object? help plz
item.dc:creator: @suomirunee suomirunee
item.description:
@suomirunee wrote:

winram101:

Ok i got that down…but when i go to autospawn to make a guy that stands there for like a portal and what not, i compile and its fine but the when i run server i get a error and when anyone trys login on it says there already loggd on

I know that error it’s from .cfg files you made there something wrong. Does the runserver say something Exeption in main?

Read full topic
item.source: How to Add an object? help plz

item.title: How to Add an object? help plz
item.dc:creator: @suomirunee suomirunee
item.description:
@suomirunee wrote:

[quote=“Sunkist, post:2, topic:220781”]go under client and search “makeglobalobject”

you should see something like this

[quote] makeGlobalObject(xxxx, yyyy, objID, -2, 10);//openchest
[/quote]

the “xxxx” is the x co-ord the object is going to be
the “yyyy” is the y co-ord…duh
and the "objID is the id of the object…again, duh

dont worry about the other 2 numbers[/quote] other of the nubers the -2 is the direction where it faces

Read full topic
item.source: How to Add an object? help plz

item.title: How to Add an object? help plz
item.dc:creator: @_Sunkist _Sunkist_
item.description:
@_Sunkist wrote:

go under client and search “makeglobalobject”

you should see something like this

makeGlobalObject(xxxx, yyyy, objID, -2, 10);//openchest

the “xxxx” is the x co-ord the object is going to be
the “yyyy” is the y co-ord…duh
and the "objID is the id of the object…again, duh

dont worry about the other 2 numbers
